description.value:
You whisper the parables of the Whirling Sands, and enter a trance. As you do, loose sand or dirt begins to flutter and turn in a spiral. As you maintain this meditation, you make spinning gestures, perhaps aided by loose fluttering clothing. As you spin and turn, you feel yourself becoming closer to the center of the whirling sands.

@UUID[Compendium.immortal-ardor.classes.5KFOBoXHsqbKQSm8]{Effect: Zephyr Meditation}

When you cast this spell, you gain 2 Zeal and sand whirls around you in a 5-foot emanation. Once per round when you cast this spell or when you sustain this spell, you spin with the sands and perform one of the following recitations:

  • @UUID[Compendium.immortal-ardor.classes.2o9yuCUU9izmxQbo]{Be the Harrying Wind}: You Step and gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn.

  • @UUID[Compendium.immortal-ardor.classes.bHKQ4GAP9p9jzwW9]{Be the Shifting Wall}: You Shove a creature, and your emanation of whirling sand becomes difficult terrain to your enemies until the start of your next turn.

  • @UUID[Compendium.immortal-ardor.classes.7INv4MWftsseNUDU]{Be the Grain of Sand}: You Reposition a creature, and your emanation of whirling sand allows allies to move through without provoking reactions until the start of your next turn.

Heightened (3rd): Your emanation increases to 10 feet.

Heightened (6th): Your emanation increases to 15 feet.

Heightened (9th): Your emanation increases to 20 feet.
